item.title: Analyzing Commercial Bank Feasibility with R
item.author: dylan.mcdowell226@gmail.com (Dylan McDowell)
item.description: Intro Lately I have been doing some consulting work on the topic of commercial bank feasibility in the state of Idaho. My client is interested in looking at potential under-serviced markets they could expand to. While I wonâ€™t publish specific data concerning my client, I thought this could be a good opportunity to play with some public data published by the Bureau of Labor Statistics, US Census Bureau, FDIC and others.
